articles.title: Trump is in Scotland. The Epstein questions have followed him there - NPR
articles.description: President Trump is expected to spend much of his time at his golf courses. He'll also meet with British Prime Minister Keir Starmer and European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen.
articles.content:
GLASGOW, Scotland President Trump landed in Scotland on Friday for a four-day trip expected to include a mix of personal time and diplomacy.
Trump will spend much of his time during the trip at his … [+3509 chars]
